byline.original: By NIRAJ CHOKSHI and CHRISTOPHER MELE

lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee County sheriff requested the aid of the National Guard after a night of violence and fires following the shooting of an armed man by an officer.
snippet: The Milwaukee County sheriff requested the aid of the National Guard after a night of violence and fires following the shooting of an armed man by an officer....

headline.main: National Guard Deployed in Milwaukee Amid Unrest Over Fatal Police Shooting
